title: App Bar and Answer Buttons do not hide themselves, after manually making them visible in fullscreen mode.
body:
###### Reproduction Steps 1. Enable Fullscreen mode (Hide system bars and answer buttons) 2. Start reviewing 3. Swipe down from the top of the screen to reveal the App Bar and Answer Buttons 4. Tap on the screen/Wait ###### Expected Result App Bar and Answer Buttons should be hidden after tapping on the card area, or after a few seconds. (Ideally both, and I remember that this used to happen with previous versions in an older device.) ###### Actual Result App Bar and Answer Buttons persist and cover parts of the card content. They persist on changing the screen orientation, though they will be hidden again upon exiting and reentering the review screen, or switching between day and night mode from the sidebar. https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/71895835/133028129-a118cef8-f3b0-4822-92a2-dfd9a3b32cd5.mp4 ###### Debug info AnkiDroid Version = 2.15.6 Android Version = 11 Manufacturer = Xiaomi Model = M2101K7AI Hardware = qcom Webview User Agent = Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 11; M2101K7AI Build/RKQ1.201022.002; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/93.0.4577.62 Mobile Safari/537.36 ACRA UUID = 21a28af9-7c61-4cc0-a633-462a608f2ff1 Scheduler = std2 Crash Reports Enabled = true DatabaseV2 Enabled = true ###### Research *Enter an [x] character to confirm the points below:* - [x] I have read the [support page](https://ankidroid.org/docs/help.html) and am reporting a bug or enhancement request specific to AnkiDroid - [x] I have checked the [manual](https://ankidroid.org/docs/manual.html) and the [FAQ](https://github.com/ankidroid/Anki-Android/wiki/FAQ) and could not find a solution to my issue - [x] I have searched for similar existing issues here and on the user forum - [x] (Optional) I have confirmed the issue is not resolved in the latest alpha release (Replicated with AnkiDroid 2.16alpha14 using the ParallelA APK) ###### Notes - The issue persists even when I have given permission for ankidroid to go fullscreen from the App Settings -
